question: You are starting a new business and need to build a website. You have a friend who works for an IT company who you want to help you. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter •	describe your new business •	ask your friend to help you build the website•	say how you will thank your friend for his/her help.
text: I hope you and your family are doing well. I am writing this letter to request you help me in my startup by building a website.

I am excited to tell you that I recently start a business selling customized elegant clothes for people who need extra large sizes. In fact, we know how people like us get treated in shops and other situations. Therefore, I have decided to open a shop only for our community.

In addition, I need your assistance in creating a website for my company Firstly, we will display some plus-size model pictures along with the importance and goal of this website. Secondly, the services and clothes available for now. Moreover, I believe we will expand soon by including different states and countries.

Importantly, I cannot express my words to thank you. To conclude, I am sure you support all my new ideas to work out personally and mentally. Same time, I invite you and your family to my new home this Saturday.
Looking forward for you to your reply,
